dcterms:creator: Nguyen Thi Duyen
Ngo Xuan Bach
Tu Minh Phuong
dcterms:description: The Ntc-sv2 dataset includes reviews about food and restaurants on Foody, consisting of 50,000 samples. The labels are assigned based on the average score: those above 8.5 are labeled positive, and those below 5 are labeled negative.
dcterms:title: Ntc-sv2

dcterms:creator: Bo Pang
Lillian Lee
Shivakumar Vaithyanathan
dcterms:description: The Vreview dataset is built on the training dataset of a competition of AIVIVN on sentiment analysis, consisting of usersâ€™ comments on product reviews from various e-commerce sites, including comments about food and restaurants on Foody. Labels are assigned based on average scores, with scores above 7.5 labeled positive and below 5 labeled negative.
dcterms:title: Vreview
